modifers.question: String: The content to display
modifers.type: String: The question type (see the rest of this arr for types)
modifers.required: Boolean: If the question is required

modifers.multiple: Boolean to define if it is a radio or checkbox input type
modifers.other: Boolean to allow a custom input option
modifers.vertical: Boolean defining if the options should be displayed horziontally or vertically.

modifers.questions: Array of JSON objects of additional questions
modifers._id_modifer: The id modifer of the questions will be appended with a _ and auto incremented number

_required_modifer: If required is true, then it will act like a do while loop
_question_modifer: The question modifer is used as a the button label
_description: This is used to have repeated questions

_what: This is more of an info page.
